unnormalised: Please ensure the latest version of the SDK, v2.5.1, is installed before initiating the debugging process as specified in the project documentation dated 20/07/2024. Refer to section 3.2 of the guide for troubleshooting steps if error code 0x80070002 is encountered.
normalised: Please ensure the latest version of the S-D-K, version two point five point one, is installed before initiating the debugging process as specified in the project documentation dated twentieth july two thousand and twenty four. Refer to section three point two of the guide for troubleshooting steps if error code zero x eight zero zero seven zero zero zero two is encountered.
